name: Institute of Makers of Explosives
goal: The mission of the Institute of Makers of Explosives is to promote safety and security and the protection of employees, users, the public and the environment and encourage the adoption of uniform rules and regulations in the manufacture, transportation, storage, handling, use and disposal of explosive materials.  To advocate at all levels of government the adoption of rules and regulations consistent with safety and security in the manufacture, transportation, storage, handling, use and disposal of explosive materials.
interests: Borders and Security, Communication, Energy, Foreign affairs and security policy, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: EU Directives related to safety and security of explosives and hazardous materials.
